front.title: Using the GOST 28147-89, GOST R 34.11-94, GOST R 34.10-94 and GOST R 34.10-2001 algorithms with the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS)

abstract.t: This document describes the conventions for using cryptographic algorithms GOST 28147-89, GOST R 34.10-94, GOST R 34.10-2001, GOST R 34.11-94, along with Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS). The CMS is used for digital signature, digest, authentication and encryption of arbitrary message contents.
